name: Cloud City
description: Suspended high among the pastel clouds of Bespin is a floating metropolis of sophisticated beauty and political freedom.

name: Death Star
description: Both as impregnable fortress and as symbol of the Emperor's inviolable rule, the deep-space mobile battle station was an achievement on the order of any fashioned by the ancestral species that had unlocked the secret of hyperspace and opened the galaxy to exploration

name: Jabbas Palace
description: was the base of operations for Jabba the Hutt, a crime lord and ruling member of the Grand Hutt Council

name: Yodas Hut
description: The hut is simple, constructed of mud, but utilizes Yoda's E3-standard starship lifeboat model escape pod energy source

name: Padme Amidalas Kingdom
description: a small pastoral world located near the border of the Outer Rim Territories.[5] Naboo did not have a molten core, instead it was comprised of a flooded cave network

Scarif was a secluded and tropical planet[4] in the Outer Rim[1] used by the Galactic Empire to house the construction of the first Death Star, an armored battle station capable of destroying entire worlds.
